❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **cute and easy crochet mushroom hat pattern** this crochet mushroom hat pattern is perfect for advanced beginners it s a quick and easy crochet beanie that works up quickly the toadstool-style mushroom hat will add fun and flair to your look whether you re going on woodland hikes or afternoon coffee dates this crochet mushroom hat has a video tutorial https //youtu be/axvq77-rl9i 1 the downloadable ad-free pdf also has a blank chart for you to color in your own yarn choices to read more about crochet colorwork please visit https //brianakdesigns com/ways-to-colorwork-incrochet/ 2 the mushroom beanie hat is worked in rounds from bottom-up in fair isle crochet **crochet hook ** recommended hook size g 4 0mm & h 5 0mm 3 or size to meet gauge you may need to change hook sizes smaller or bigger depending on your crochet gauge **notions ** removable stitch marker 4 yarn needle to weave in ends 5 and make french knots scissors 6 faux fur pom pom 7 optional **yarn ** wecrochet swish dk 8 100% fine superwash merino wool color a 2 balls allspice color b 1 ball nutmeg heather color c 1 ball rainforest heather small amount of white yarn suggested yarn substitute mary maxim mellowspun dk 9 **yardage ** total yards 160 210 260 180 **abbreviations/stitches ** chain chain round- round single_crochet single_crochet ssc split single_crochet 10 ssc2tog split single_crochet 2 together slip_stitch slip_stitch st s stitch es **gauge ** 13 sts and 15 row = 4 inches in split single_crochet using a larger hook blocked 20 sts and 16 row = 4 inches in single_crochet through back loop only blocked not sure what gauge is check out this blog post what is crochet gauge and how to fix it 11 **hat measurements/sizes ** baby child adult s/m adult l/xl brim circumference 13½ 15¾ 18 20¼ inches finished item relaxed stretches comfortably to fit head circumference 16-17 18-19 20-21 22-23 inches **skill level **
